data.title: Seattle International Film Festival 1986 Archive

Coming Soon to a Theater Near You

An Evening with Krzysztof Zanussi - included The Power of Evil

Foreign Film Poster Exhibition and Auction

Golden Space Needle Awards

Heimat, presented in its entirety twice: once in a 2-day marathon showing at the Egyptian and once in a 4-part showing on weekend matinees over 3 weeks at the Market Theatre

Mugge Music Movies - included Gospel According to Al Green, The Return of Ruben Blades, Cool Runnings: The Reggae Movie

The Red Eye Special: 70 mm All-Nighter at the Cinerama - included Alien, The Thing, Emerald Forest, Mad Max Beyond Thunderdome

A Salute to Jan de Bont

The Secret Festival

Sleeping Beauty, presented in 70mm and 6-Track Dolby Stereo at Cinerama

They Only Come Out at Night - included Eyes of Fire, Mixed Blood, Population: One, Re-Animator, Strangler vs. Strangler, The Stuff, The Toxic Avenger, The Red Eye Special: 70 mm All-Nighter at the Cinerama

A Tribute to the National Film Board of Canada
